content: the brunch bucket hat crochet pattern has a simple textured look with a subtle flared brim this combined with cotton yarn makes it perfect for summer days the long brim also makes this hat great for donation to your local cancer center materials-- 100g/190yds worsted weight yarn i used dishie in lilac mist h/5 0 mm hook g/4 0 mm hook yarn needle scissors level-- easy+ - intermediate approx finished size small adult length 7 5 circumference around base of head 22 there are notes in the pattern to make it one size smaller or larger
